$comment: Example: Simple Entity CRUD Wrapper - Get/Retrieval Operation
Name: Get AI Model Cost
Description: Retrieves an AI Model Cost record by ID. Demonstrates entity-specific retrieval with proper error handling and simplified parameter interface.
UserPrompt: Get an AI Model Cost record from the database using parameters from this action and maps to the parent Get Record action and its format for parameters
UserComments: This example shows retrieval pattern. Note that the entity name is 'MJ: AI Model Costs' (with prefix) - AI will use exact name from schema. The action takes a simple 'ID' parameter instead of the parent's complex 'PrimaryKey' object, making it easier for workflow designers.

Parameters.Name: ID
Parameters.Description: The ID (primary key) of the AI Model Cost record to retrieve

Parameters.Name: ModelCostRecord
Parameters.Description: The retrieved AI Model Cost record

ResultCodes.Description: ID parameter is missing or invalid
No record exists with the provided ID
The parent Get Record action failed

GeneratedCodePattern.Step3: Map to parent format: PrimaryKey={ID: id}, EntityName='MJ: AI Model Costs'
